Favorite word: Euthymia - well-being of the soul

What you need, therefore, is not any of those harsher measures which we have already left behind, the necessity of opposing yourself at this point, of being angry with yourself at that, of sternly urging yourself on at another, but that which comes last — confidence in yourself and the belief that you are on the right path, and have not been led astray by the many cross-tracks of those who are roaming in every direction, some of whom are wandering very near the path itself . But what you desire is something great and supreme and very near to being a god — to be unshaken .

On Tranquility of the mind - Seneca
